originalPath.description: Base path for all returned objects within the data-link.

type.description: Type of the item. Either `FILE` or `FOLDER`.
type.title: DataLinkItemType

name.description: Name of the file or folder.

size.description: Size of the file in bytes. For folders, always `0`.

mimeType.description: MIME type of the file, calculated by analyzing the file extension. Null for folders.

objects.description: Array of data-link items (files and folders) at the specified path.

nextPageToken.description: Token that can be used to request the next page of items. Null if no more items are available.

404.description: NotFound â€” workspace or credentials not found, API disabled for the workspace, or data-link not found
